name: Farm Frenzy: Pizza Party
description: Pizza lovers unite! It's time to return to the farm to create your favorite food! You'll start out by growing grass, feeding animals and collecting produce. Then you'll turn your goods into the ingredients you need to make different pizzas!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 700 MHz CPUMemory: 1024 MB RamDirectX®: 8

reviews.review_text: If you like playing mindless games like solitaire, you'll enjoy this one.
